Black.clinical_note: Onset is typically 10 years earlier. Corneas are often thinner, leading to artificially low IOP readings. High risk of False Negatives with standard pressure thresholds.

Hispanic.clinical_note: Open-angle glaucoma is the leading cause of blindness in this group. 75% of cases are often undiagnosed.

Asian.clinical_note: High risk of Normal Tension Glaucoma (NTG) and Angle-Closure Glaucoma. Standard IOP checks often miss NTG.

Black.model_bias_warning: High False Negative Rate detected in validation (FNR ~0.98).

Hispanic.clinical_note: Higher rates of vision-threatening proliferative DR compared to non-Hispanic Whites.

White.clinical_note: High baseline probability for Drusen/Dry AMD.

Black.clinical_note: 70% lower risk of early AMD. Macular spots may be masquerades rather than AMD.
